data.message: Created Phase 2.2 Adversarial Testing plan using Planify (Architect/Critic/Integrator): Generated comprehensive plan with 6 phases, 25 tasks. Addressed Critic concerns: baseline measurement, model pinning, concurrent access, recovery testing, edge cases, test isolation. Saved to proposals/pending/phase-2.2-adversarial-testing-planify.md
